#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <string.h>
#define ll long long int
#define ull unsigned ll
#define MAX(a, b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define MIN(a, b) ((a)>(b)?(b):(a))
#define FOR(i, a, b) for ((i) = (a); (i) <= (b); (i)++)
#define FORD(i, a, b) for ((i) = (a); (i) >= (b); (i)--)
#define FILL(a, c) memset (a, (c), sizeof (a))
#define FLOOR(a) (int)(a)
#define CIEL(a) ((int)(a) == (a))?(a):((int)(a) + 1)
#define NL printf ("\n")
#define INF (int)1e9
#define EPS (int)1e-9
#define MOD 1000000007
#define L 1001

int main () {
	int t;
	scanf ("%d", &t);
	while (t--) {
		int m, n, k, i, j;
		scanf ("%d %d %d", &m, &n, &k);
		int dp[m+1][n+1];
		dp[0][0] = 1;
		FOR(i, 0, m) {
			FOR(j, 0, n) {
				if (i-1 >= 0 && j-1 >= 0)
					dp[i][j] = (dp[i-1][j] + dp[i][j-1]) % k;
				else if (i-1 < 0 && j-1 >= 0)
					dp[i][j] = dp[i][j-1];
				else if (j-1 < 0 && i-1 >= 0)
					dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j];
			}
		}
		printf ("%d\n", dp[m][n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
